AND t1.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')
ORDER BY t2.create_time desc

SELECT t1.*,t3.name sex_name,if(t1.real_status='1','已实名','未实名') real_status_name, t2.id apply_id, t2.create_time apply_time, t2.credit_time FROM cus_user_info t1 INNER JOIN credit_apply t2 on t2.cus_user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN (select code,name from code_info where type_id=101) t3 on sex = t3.code WHERE t1.status=20 and t2.status in (2 , 3)
